in_notebook[source]

in_notebook()

Returns True if the module is running in IPython kernel, False if in IPython shell or other Python shell.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(True, in_notebook())
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def ipython_info():
    ip = False
    if 'ipykernel' in sys.modules:
        ip = 'notebook'
    elif 'IPython' in sys.modules:
        ip = 'terminal'
    return ip
